type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Inside Job[/i] – When Ephraim, Mastermind of War enters, you may have him deal damage equal to his power to target tapped creature.
[i]Reginleif[/i] – Whenever another Knight enters, Ephraim gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Ephraim deals combat damage to a player, support 2. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)[/i]
